E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 4/28/1990
Subject: Todd Ritchie healing process
Todd Ritchie is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Atsuya Furuta
Dear Sir,
Atsuya Furuta is hitting the ball well at A Lakeland Tigers!
He has an AVG of .406, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Bruce Ruffin
Dear Sir,
Bruce Ruffin is doing pretty good at AA London Tigers!
He has an ERA of 1.94, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Rich DeLucia
Dear Sir,
Rich DeLucia has nothing more to prove at AA London Tigers!
He has an ERA of 2.21 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 5/10/1990
Subject: Kazuyoshi Tatsunami learns new position
Kazuyoshi Tatsunami has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
